H0.text: Avoiding predators is what spider webs help spiders.

H1.text: Capture food is what spider webs help spiders.

H2.text: Spider webs help spiders stay dry.

H3.text: Keep warm is how spider webs help spiders.

A4.text: Webs allow a spider to catch prey without having to expend energy by running it down, making it an efficient method of gathering food.

A5.text: Many spiders build webs specifically to trap and catch insects to eat.
